articles.title: Emoji Use Makes People Feel More Connected On The Job, A Survey Says - NPR
articles.description: A survey of 7,000 emoji users in the U.S., Europe and Asia found that emoji are not only useful on the job — they can make people feel more connected and receptive to new tasks.
articles.content:
A vast majority of emoji users say the whimsical icons help them express their emotions.
Screenshot by NPR
If you've ever hesitated to add a smiley face or a thumbs-up to an email, a new survey fro… [+2605 chars]
